languages.text: "Я помогу тебе свергнуть Чорда. Каждая новая секунда ее правления будет стоить жизни сотням неповинных людей".

traits.locale_text: "Я помогу тебе свергнуть Чорда. Каждая новая секунда ее правления будет стоить жизни сотням неповинных людей".

languages.text: "I will help you overthrow Chorda. Each second of her continued rule will cost the lives of hundreds of innocent people."
languages.original_text: "Я помогу тебе свергнуть Чорда. Каждая новая секунда ее правления будет стоить жизни сотням неповинных людей".

traits.locale_text: "I will help you overthrow Chorda. Each second of her continued rule will cost the lives of hundreds of innocent people."

"I will help you overthrow Chorda. Each second of her continued rule will cost the lives of hundreds of innocent people."
"I will help you overthrow Chorda. Each second of her continued rule will cost the lives of hundreds of innocent people."

languages.text: “我会帮你推翻库尔达的统治。只要她在总督的位置上多坐一秒，就会有成百上千的无辜之人丧生。”
languages.original_text: "I will help you overthrow Chorda. Each second of her continued rule will cost the lives of hundreds of innocent people."

traits.locale_text: “我会帮你推翻库尔达的统治。只要她在总督的位置上多坐一秒，就会有成百上千的无辜之人丧生。”

languages.text: 「チョーダ打倒に協力する。彼女の支配が一秒続く毎に、何百人もの罪のない人々の命が奪われる」
languages.original_text: "I will help you overthrow Chorda. Each second of her continued rule will cost the lives of hundreds of innocent people."

traits.locale_text: 「チョーダ打倒に協力する。彼女の支配が一秒続く毎に、何百人もの罪のない人々の命が奪われる」

languages.text: «Le ayudaré a acabar con Chorda. Cada segundo de su gobierno costará la vida de cientos de inocentes».
languages.original_text: "I will help you overthrow Chorda. Each second of her continued rule will cost the lives of hundreds of innocent people."

traits.locale_text: «Le ayudaré a acabar con Chorda. Cada segundo de su gobierno costará la vida de cientos de inocentes».

languages.text: "Ich helfe Euch, Chorda zu stürzen. Jede Sekunde ihrer weiteren Herrschaft, wird Hunderte von Unschuldigen das Leben kosten."
languages.original_text: "I will help you overthrow Chorda. Each second of her continued rule will cost the lives of hundreds of innocent people."

traits.locale_text: "Ich helfe Euch, Chorda zu stürzen. Jede Sekunde ihrer weiteren Herrschaft, wird Hunderte von Unschuldigen das Leben kosten."

languages.text: « Je vous aiderai à renverser Chorda. Chaque seconde de son règne coûte la vie de centaines d'innocents. »
languages.original_text: "I will help you overthrow Chorda. Each second of her continued rule will cost the lives of hundreds of innocent people."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous aiderai à renverser Chorda. Chaque seconde de son règne coûte la vie de centaines d'innocents. »

languages.text: "Chorda'yı alaşağı etmene yardımcı olacağım. Hükmü sürerse yüzlerce masum insan canından olacak."
languages.original_text: "I will help you overthrow Chorda. Each second of her continued rule will cost the lives of hundreds of innocent people."

traits.locale_text: "Chorda'yı alaşağı etmene yardımcı olacağım. Hükmü sürerse yüzlerce masum insan canından olacak."
